thread.title: Virat Kohli's Brand Value Skyrockets And Is All Set To Surpass King Khan Of Bollywood
thread.title_full: Virat Kohli's Brand Value Skyrockets And Is All Set To Surpass King Khan Of Bollywood

author: Karishma Drabla
title: Virat Kohli's Brand Value Skyrockets And Is All Set To Surpass King Khan Of Bollywood
text:
IN Celebrities ON 22 Feb, 2017 Virat Kohli's Brand Value Skyrockets And Is All Set To Surpass King Khan Of Bollywood Share on twitter Follow Us On Virat Kohli- the name that speaks it all. The heartthrob, Virat , has not only managed to win the hearts of people due to his prowess on the field but also has proved to be smashing it off the field. 
Going by the latest data, the entrepreneur, cricketer, and the savvy investor, Kohli, is very close on the heels of the Badshah of Bollywood Shah Rukh Khan regarding brand value. 
Here are the complete deets about Virat Kohli's brand value. Virat Kohli's Brand Value Skyrockets And Is All Set To Surpass King Khan Of Bollywood 754 396 in Celebrities Virat-Kohli's-brand-value-rises Virat-Kohli Virat-Kohli-is-second-only-to-Shah-Rukh-Khan-in-terms-of-brand-value Virat-Kohli's-brand-value-stands-at-$92-million Virat-Kohli's-brand-value-only-behind-SRK Virat-surpassed-MS-Dhoni-in-terms-of-brand-value Virat-Kohli-becomes-valuable-cricketer-in-India Virat Kohli is a perfect combination of style and passionate personality mixed with a dash of aggression. Loading... The 28-year-old man who proved himself a toast of the cricketing fraternity is now ready to set another record. Loading... He is not only the Indian cricket team captain but also the savvy endorser of more than 17 brands. Loading... Recently, the brown-eyed boy signed a deal worth Rs. 110 crore with sports lifestyle brand Puma. Loading... However, it would be no surprise to see the worth of Kohli going up by 25%. Loading... Reportedly, his brand value has witnessed a major jump of late surging to a whopping $92 million. Loading... Whereas Shah Rukh Khan's worth is $131 million and he's on the top of the brand value list. Loading... Hence, Kohli is only second to none other than SRK. Loading... Well, with consistent achievements, it won't be long before Kohli displaces King Khan from his top brand value throne. Loading... Is Virat Kohli your favourite? others like
